mapper.select: SELECT a.sectionFee + a.monthFee AS Fee FROM globalbiz.MemFeeInfo AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.DeptMst AS b ON a.deptType = b.deptType AND a.memType = b.memType AND a.feeType = b.feeType WHERE b.deptCD = #{deptCD} AND a.bookNum = #{bookNum} AND a.weekNum = #{week}

SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(mFstName,''), IFNULL(mLstName,'')) AS memName, CONCAT(IFNULL(gFstName,''), IFNULL(gLstName,'')) AS guardianName, addr AS address, city, ePhone AS phone, MIN(statusCD) AS statusCD, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{jisaCD},'0008', MIN(statusCD),'','') AS statusName FROM globalbiz.MemMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS b ON a.memKey = b.memKey WHERE CONCAT(mFstName, mLstName) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR CONCAT(gFstName, gLstNAme) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') GROUP BY a.memKey, a.mFstName, a.mLstName, a.gFstName, a.gLstName, a.addr, a.city, a.ePhone
